set_system_mode.description: Sets the system mode, either indefinitely, or for a specified period of time, after which it will revert to Auto. Not all systems support all modes.

duration.description: The duration in hours; used only with AutoWithEco mode (up to 24 hours).
duration.name: Duration

mode.description: Mode to set the system to.

period.description: A period of time in days; used only with Away, DayOff, or Custom mode. The system will revert to Auto mode at midnight (up to 99 days, today is day 1).
period.name: Period

set_system_mode.name: Set system mode

set_zone_override.description: Overrides a zone's setpoint, either indefinitely, or for a specified period of time, after which it will revert to following its schedule.

duration.description: The zone will revert to its schedule after this time. If 0 the change is until the next scheduled setpoint.
duration.name: Duration

entity_id.description: The entity ID of the Evohome zone.
entity_id.name: Entity

setpoint.description: The temperature to be used instead of the scheduled setpoint.
setpoint.name: Setpoint

set_zone_override.name: Set zone override
